{"id":649221232,"lang":"cpp","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1645882439,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/649221232/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Replace All ?'s to Avoid Consecutive Repeating Characters","memory":"6.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string modifyString(string s) {\n        s = 'x' + s + 'x';\n        char v[128] = {0};\n        for(int i=1;i<s.size()-1;i++){\n            if(s[i]=='?'){\n                v[s[i-1]]++;\n                v[s[i+1]]++;\n                for(int j=0;j<3;j++){\n                    if(v[j+'a']==0){\n                        s[i] = (char)(j+'a');\n                        break;\n                    }\n                }\n                v[s[i-1]]--;\n                v[s[i+1]]--;\n            }\n        }\n        return s.substr(1,s.size()-2);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"replace-all-s-to-avoid-consecutive-repeating-characters"}
